channel.title: Need someone to make command for meh
channel.description:
i need someone to give make me a command accessable by all ppl.
that gives drag chain, drag legs, drag sq, abby whip, drag helm, fury, and lava cape.
thx to anyone that helps..
:D

item.title: Need someone to make command for meh
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

In client.java find -

[code] public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();[/code]

Under that add -

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragon")) { addItem(3140, 1); addItem(4087, 1); addItem(1187, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(1149, 1); addItem(6585, 1); addItem(6570, 1); }

When you type ::dragon, you get those items. Enjoy

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to make command for meh
